desc: Get ready to save on clip in hair extensions. Our hair is 100% Remy hair that's tangle and shed free. Can be styled in straight, wavy or curly. Create your new look with 100% Remy human hair.

layout.text: SECRETS OF RED CARPET HAIR IS OUT!
GET REAL REMY CLIP IN EXTENSIONS, RED CARPET STYLE.
"Thrilled with my purchase. Shipment was very timely! Hair is exactly what is described and the quality is amazing."
